attributes.additional_details:
Chancellor lost credibility as UK continues to loose its credit rating. Immigration rates have not changed and home secretary has not been able to demonstrate the promised change. 
Govt. was not prepared to take up the task of aftermath of referendum. 
Us public has to take the lead on this Westminster bunch who have proven to successfully utilise every opportunity available to bring about the regime change whether it was Labour party or Tories. 
Parliament has lost its mandate and credibility.
attributes.background:
Leave campaign was fuelled by lies and flawed statistics. 
David Cameron lost the ground after loosing referendum gamble. Jeremy Corbyn has been taken hostage by Westminster Labour party and had a coup on his leadership against the will of people who elected him.
